headline: 4 Pipeline Stocks to Buy With $1,000 and Hold Forever
summary: Pipeline companies remain well positioned despite the current disruption in the energy markets.  At the same time, demand for natural gas is growing.  This is coming from the increased power consumption stemming from artificial intelligence (AI), as well as from export demand from Mexico and for LNG (liquified natural gas) to Asia and Europe.
